ing: 1/4 cup unsweetened apple juice, or to taste
des: "They don't sell Strawberry Nectar in my town, so I make my own. The apple juice is for sweetness. Be careful: not all brands have a good aftertaste even frozen. Fresh juiced apple is better. Thawed frozen strawberries may be used when fresh is not available. Be sure to use unsweetened ones."
ins: Combine the strawberries and apple juice in a blender or food processor. Puree until smooth, then blend in water to your desired thickness.
